sources.title: When a Man Rides Alone (1933) TOM TYLER
sources.description:
Stars: Tom Tyler, Adele Lacy, Al Bridge
 Director: J.P. McGowan

 The Llano Kid is robbing stages but only taking money from Montana Slade's Cottonwood Mine. He then gives the money to those cheated by Slade. The Sheriff is after him and eventually obtains a picture and displays wanted posters and is soon after him.

metadata.Plot: The Llano Kid is robbing stages but only taking money from Montana Slade's Cottonwood Mine. He then gives the money to those cheated by Slade. The Sheriff is after him and eventually obtains a picture and displays wanted posters and is soon after him.
